#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem through target camera.

=== Overview ===
The through target camera points to a given position (the "focus") through the target. The camera orientation is fixed by a yaw axis.
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetThroughTargetCameraModeFocusPosition(real camera_id, real x, real y, real z)
----
Sets the position of the camera.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _x_, _y_, _z_ - The position of the camera.
